nodes.documentation:
he DRCT_Token is an ERC20 compliant token representing the payout of the swap contract
pecified in the Factory contract.
ach Factory contract is specified one DRCT Token and the token address can contain many
ifferent swap contracts that are standardized at the Factory level.
nodes.name: DRCT_Token

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref)
mapping(address => struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref)
struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage pointer

nodes.documentation: dev events for transfer and approvals
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation:
dev Constructor - sets values for token name and token supply, as well as the 
aster_contract, the swap.
param _factory
nodes.name: DRCT_Token

struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
dev Token Creator - This function is called by the factory contract and creates new tokens
or the user
param _supply amount of DRCT tokens created by the factory contract for this swap
param _owner
param _swap
nodes.name: createToken

param _party being paid
param _swap
nodes.name: pay

nodes.documentation:
dev Returns the users total balance (sum of tokens in all swaps the user has tokens in)
param _owner user address
return user total balance
nodes.name: balanceOf

return total supply

nodes.documentation:
dev Removes the address from the swap balances for a swap, and moves the last address in the
wap into their place
param _remove address of prevous owner
param _swap address used to get last addrss of the swap to replace the removed address
nodes.name: removeFromSwapBalances

nodes.documentation:
dev This is the main function to update the mappings when a transfer happens
param _from address to send funds from
param _to address to send funds to
param _amount amount of token to send
nodes.name: transferHelper

nodes.documentation:
RC20 compliant transfer function
param _to Address to send funds to
param _amount Amount of token to send
return true for successful
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation:
dev ERC20 compliant transferFrom function
param _from address to send funds from (must be allowed, see approve function)
param _to address to send funds to
param _amount amount of token to send
return true for successful
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
dev ERC20 compliant approve function
param _spender party that msg.sender approves for transferring funds
param _amount amount of token to approve for sending
return true for successful
nodes.name: approve

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref)
struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
dev Counts addresses involved in the swap based on the length of balances array for _swap
param _swap address
return the length of the balances array for the swap
nodes.name: addressCount

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref)
struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
dev Gets the owner address by specifying the swap address and index
param _ind specified index in the swap
param _swap specified swap address
return the owner address associated with a particular index in a particular swap
nodes.name: getHolderByIndex

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref)
struct DRCT_Token.Balance storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
dev Gets the balance by specifying the swap address and index
param _ind specified index in the swap
param _swap specified swap address
return the balance associated with a particular index in a particular swap
nodes.name: getBalanceByIndex

nodes.documentation:
dev Gets the index by specifying the swap and owner addresses
param _owner specifed address
param _swap  specified swap address
return the index associated with the _owner address in a particular swap
nodes.name: getIndexByAddress

nodes.documentation:
dev Look up how much the spender or contract is allowed to spend?
param _owner 
param _spender party or contract? approved for transfering funds 
return the allowed amount _spender can spend of _owner's balance
nodes.name: allowance
